QuestData.Title: The Highlord Calls
QuestData.Description:
Highlord Fordragon needs you in Oribos right away!
I'm not sure of the details, but the messenger mentioned the Maw.
You should go to him as soon as you can. If the Maw is involved, it must be serious!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon in Oribos.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon in Oribos.
